issue.title: [C++] Improve thread pool size heuristic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2569](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2569). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently use the number of available HW threads as the default thread pool size for CPU-bound tasks. We should also examine well-known environment variables such as `OMP_NUM_THREADS`. Some discussion here: https://bugs.python.org/issue32986
